description:
One day, Seigi runs into Hase Keigo, the senior from his karate class who  he admired.
Delighted by their reunion, Seigi refers Hase to Etranger since he is looking for a jeweler.
Meanwhile, Richard is concerned with Seigi`s over-exuberant desire to help his senior.
Hase arrives at Etranger looking to sell a fire opal.
He begins telling the story of Seigi`s grandmother as though it is his own...
Source: crunchyroll
